description: This scroll defines the license gate logic for plugin activation and remix validation. Vaultwarden ensures that only sovereign scrolls unlock plugin slots and remix chains.
usage_instructions: Bind this scroll to the Vaultwarden persona. Use it to validate incoming scrolls and activate plugin slots in Control Room.
installation_notes: Ensure vault-core and dashboard-ui modules are active before binding this scroll.

changes: Initial release of Vaultwarden License Gate Scroll.
Added plugin slot orchestration and scroll binding logic.
